subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
Freedom and Human Rights
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — I went to a little park by the west moat of the Forbidden City as the time of the opening ceremony approached Friday. There was a man fishing there, by the moat.
snippet: BEIJING — I went to a little park by the west moat of the Forbidden City as the time of the opening ceremony approached Friday. There was a man fishing there, by the moat.
